tha-ap545:7.3: Sarena mahatā vīro → sussarena mahāvīro (bj); sarena mahatā dhīro (sya1ed, sya2ed); susarena mahāvīro (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap545:10.2: sattāhikampi vo → sattahikaṃ hi vo (bj); sattāhakādhikaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); sattāhikaṃ vibho (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap545:27.4: pāpatiṃ → papatiṃ (bj); pāpiṭṭhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); pāpattaṃ (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
